name: Bearded Programmer Sven
description:
This is a game about Sven, a programmer, merged with a beard, who has to resolve a git merge conflict. Unfortunately, he gets merged into the computer and has to find his way out of the game.

It's the sex that sells the game.

(Made for Godot Wild Jam #13, theme: Merge)

Source code can be found here: https://github.com/Alexander-Hjelm/bearded-programmer-sven
